Package com.csd4020.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csd4020.controller.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Controller class coordinates interactions between the View and the Model.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  Controller.DrawTileListener
      Inner class which implements the ActionListener interface in order to be used as the View's Draw button listener.
      (package private) class  Controller.EndTurnListener
      Inner class which implements the ActionListener interface in order to be used as the View's End turn button listener.
      (package private) class  Controller.PlayCardListener
      Inner class which implements the MouseListener interface in order to allow the user to click on a card of the board and interact with it.
      (package private) class  Controller.StopCardEffectListener
      Inner class which implements the ActionListener interface in order to be used as the View's Stop card effect button listener.
      (package private) class  Controller.TakeTileFromAreaListener
      Inner class which implements the MouseListener interface in order to allow the user to click on a Tile of the board and interact with it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller​(AmphipolisFrame view,
                  Board boardModel)
        Constructor for the Controller class.
        Parameters:
        view - A JFrame subclass containing the final GUI of the game.
        boardModel - A Model class representing the Board of the game and its functionalities. Precondition: view is a subclass of JFrame & exposes all necessary view components to the Controller & boardModel is a model class that exposes all necessary functionality of the game's board to the Controller.. Postcondition: A Controller object is created which coordinates everything needed for the uninterrupted flow of a game lot.

    • Method Detail

      • drawTilesFromBag

        private void drawTilesFromBag()
        Called when the Draw button is clicked the first time each round. Responsible for drawing tiles from the bag and placing them on the board.

      • displayWinner

        private void displayWinner()
        Displays the winner of the game in a dialog and exits upon clicking 'OK'.

      • updateTileCounts

        private void updateTileCounts()
        Updates the view's tile count of each tile in every area based on the model.

      • endTurn

        private void endTurn()
        Called when the End Turn button is clicked. Responsible for handling end of turn events, such as swapping player info and starting the next player's turn.

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This method is responsible for showing the GUI of the game so that the game can begin.

      • setPlayerInfo

        private void setPlayerInfo​(Player curPlayer)
        Method responsible for updating the Player UI info (name,tile collection,cards) with the passed player's data.
        Parameters:
        curPlayer - The current player

      • setPlayerNameInView

        private void setPlayerNameInView​(java.lang.String playerName)
        Method responsible for updating the active player's name shown in the UI.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The current player's name

      • setPlayerCardSetInView

        private void setPlayerCardSetInView​(Card[] playerCards)
        Method responsible for updating the UI with the active player's card set.
        Parameters:
        playerCards - The current player's cards

      • setPlayerTilesListInView

        private void setPlayerTilesListInView()
        Method responsible for changing the player's tile collection when the previous player has ended his turn.

      • handlePlayCardEvent

        private void handlePlayCardEvent​(java.lang.String cardName)
        Method responsible for executing the effect of the selected card if it hasn't been used already.
        Parameters:
        cardName - The card the player selected to play

      • enableCardEffect

        private void enableCardEffect​(java.lang.String cardName)
        Enables the effect of the card matching the given card name.
        Parameters:
        cardName - The name of the card whose effect to enable Precondition: cardName is a valid card name Postcondition: The effect will be enabled

      • disableCardEffect

        public void disableCardEffect()
        Performs all necessary actions to stop the currently active card's effect.

      • getCanDraw

        public boolean getCanDraw()
        Observer function which returns whether the player can draw or not.

      • setCanDraw

        public void setCanDraw​(boolean canDraw)
        Transformer function which changes whether the player can draw or not.
        Parameters:
        canDraw - The value to set canDraw to
